name: Independent European Vaping Alliance
goal:
Uniting companies in the vaping sector, which are independent of the tobacco industry, and providing them with means of​ ​responsible representation​.
The founding purpose of IEVA is to fight with one voice against local and community regulations, which are not suited to vaping products and their potential in terms of public health and health risk reduction.
We aim at strengthening independent vaping industry of shops, retail and manufacturers all throughout Europe and beyond and represent e-cigarettes as a category in opposition to tobacco.
interests: Consumers, Customs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Youth
euInitiatives:
Tobacco Products Directive Revision (TPD 3)
Excise Duties (TAXUD)
6-Month-Standstill after product registration
